Weapons:

STINGER PISTOL
+1 ATTACK+1 ACCURACYRange 8   Threat 3   1 Energy   LOADED
On Hit

Targets become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

HEX MISSILES
+0 ATTACK+1 ACCURACYRange 10   Blast 1   3 Heat   LOADED
Tags

SMART

Templates:

COMMANDER


Systems:

HORNET

STINGER PISTOL

No description given.

WEAVE

Each round, the first attack made against the Hornet as a reaction automatically fails.

SSC TOTAL SUITE

The Hornet can hover whenever they move or Boost.

IMPALE SYSTEMS

The Hornet makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, they take {3/4/5} Heat and become Jammed until the end of their next turn.

HEX MISSILES

No description given.

ADAPT/EVADE/DISENGAGE

The Hornet gains Immunity to Grapple and always ignores engagement.

UMBRAL INTERDICTION

Trigger:A character within Sensors and line of sight attempts an attack.
The target must pass a Systems check or their attack automatically misses.

COMMANDER

VOICE OF AUTHORITY

Trigger:An allied character fails an attack, check or save, and the Commander isn’t Jammed.
The ally can reroll it.

REINFORCED

The Commander gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

COMMANDER TRAITS

The Commander chooses one option from the Commander Traits list. It doesn’t function if the Commander is Jammed.

QUICK MARCH

One allied character within line of sight of the Commander may Boost.
